title: Revert appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two instances of the Revert option in the menu.
OB: When opening the popup menu in a Java editor, I noticed that there are two instances of the Revert option.
EB: The Revert option should only appear once in the popup menu.
SR: To resolve this issue, please make sure that the Revert option only appears once in the popup menu, after the UNDO option and before the FORMAT option.
